attributes.action: state clearly in the Labour Party prospectus and in the media how those parties in the banking, insurance and credit rating agencies will be punished for their actions in causing the current economic collapse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A massive crime has been perpetrated on the UK and the World. Many millions of lives have been damaged and destroyed.
If we are a true democracy, the guilty must be punished and not rewarded no matter what the short term cost to the economy. Otherwise a similar fraud will be perpetrated and our country will loose the trust of its citizens.
